 Try again ? Add voice record Voice record GET STARTED Search Create a note Comfortable menu Quick actions menu Simple search on created notes and easiest interface. Create notes fast, easy and comfortable. Select colour of note, add images and references in 2 clicks. In awkward situations, quickly add a note, link, or image. PIN CODE ICON Pin-code right. Pin-code isn't right. Enter 5 digits pin-code. Enter pin-code repeat Go Next You exit and don't save note. Save note Save last unsaved note? Forget pin-code Set pin-code Add a secret word.
